name: Clément David's CV, articles and other stuff.
body:
Clément David's homepage
========================

Welcome to my personnal homepage. Here you will found some link to my
work, OSS and others.

All the informations in this website is copyrighted and *MUST* be copied
with respect to the [Artistic
Licence](http://www.opensource.org/licenses/artistic-license-2.0.php).

This site is organized through differents sections :

-   [Projects](projects/index.xhtml "My projects")

    OSS projects I am interested by.

-   [Articles](articles/index.xhtml "My articles")

    Technical are not, short or not texts.

-   [About](about/index.xhtml "About me")

    All informations about me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
